metadata.title: CVE-2024-32041 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. FreeRDPbased clients that use a version of FreeRDP prior to 3.5.0 or 2.11.6 arevulnerable to out-of-bounds read. Versions 3.5.0 and 2.11.6 patch theissue. As a workaround, deactivate `/gfx` (on by default, set `/bpp` or`/rfx` options instead.

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
